name: Sentinel Station
description:
In Sentinel Station, you take on the role of an advanced artificial intelligence tasked with protecting the titular space station from invaders. With the ability to inhabit any robot body on board, you must use your unique skills and tactical acumen to outsmart and overpower the attackers before they destroy your central server.

The game is a 2D arena shooter with as fast-paced gameplay, and includes a customizable difficulty option.

Made in a week by a solo developer in Godot for the Indie Game Dev Begginers #003 game jam with the theme of Robots.
